entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
